description: Test suite for MistralChat agent functionalities, including basic, streaming, async, memory, response modeling, JSON mode, history, and reasoning tests within the agno project.

classes.name: MovieScript
classes.description: Pydantic model for movie script with title, genre, and plot fields.

methods.name: _assert_metrics
methods.description: Helper function to assert that response metrics contain positive token counts and their sum matches total tokens.

methods.name: test_basic
methods.description: Tests basic agent response and metrics.

methods.name: test_basic_stream
methods.description: Tests streaming response from the agent.

methods.name: test_async_basic
methods.description: Asynchronous test for basic agent response.

methods.name: test_with_memory
methods.description: Tests agent memory and history functionality.

methods.name: test_response_model
methods.description: Tests agent response with a structured Pydantic model.

methods.name: test_json_response_mode
methods.description: Tests agent response in JSON mode with a structured model.

methods.name: test_history
methods.description: Tests session history management with SQLite storage.

methods.name: test_with_reasoning
methods.description: Tests agent with an additional reasoning model.
